Nightstrike:

Nightsrike avoided the first attack of Unitron "Do you like that I 
destroy him, my lord"said the male to Megatron while he prepared his 
weapons

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The two blasts pounded Megatron's already dented and charred chest, 
but
> if he was in pain from them, he did not show it. He kept moving 
forward.
> "I will show you the meaning of that title." he was now moved right 
in
> front of Unitron, and reached for the hand with the laser pistol.
